strings.Value: "What are you doing here?"
"You haven't escaped. You were released after they've infected you with the magic seeds."
"Climb down this hill and run away. The militia headquarters are located near the goblin camp — head there. Once we have freed all the prisoners, we'll find a way to cure you."
[Attack] "I cannot risk my men that are waiting behind the gates. We'll have to kill you."
"How did you manage to hide from the goblins?"
"Aaah! {g|Erastil}Erastil{/g} have mercy, you've scared us!"
"You... who are you? Have you come to rescue us?"
"Hiding. We managed to flee from the shaman... right after the ritual!"

"That little freak almost drowned us! At first he was jumping all around us and waving his crutch, but then he took a pot of water and started to pour it into us! I thought, that'll be the end of us..."

"And then it got weird... the goblins untied us from the column, lead us away and then just forgot all about us — they were busy with the other prisoners! Well, we didn't lose any time... And now we're thinking about climbing down this slope and getting outta here!"
"Wh... what? You mean... the water..."
"No, no... no! It can't be! Stop scaring us! We just need to get out of this place!"
"They... they haven't really looked for us, to be honest."
"So we just hid in these bushes and were waiting for the right moment to make a run for it."
"It is true. The water is contaminated. I am sorry. Please, do not panic — with {g|Sarenrae}Sarenrae's{/g} help, we might still save you..."
"You would do better not to waste the last minutes of your life running. You cannot outrun death, after all. Let us pray to {g|Groetus}Groetus{/g} together. He will help you accept the inevitable."
{n}Valerie swallows heavily and places her hand on her weapon.{/n} "We cannot let them go. For the safety of others in the camp."
"Your death will be quick and painless. This is all we can do for you."
"No! Please!"
{n}Kalikke turns pale.{/n} "What a terrible choice... but it's possible that they drank the water and didn't get sick. We must give them a chance, despite the risk!"
